verbs.description: [ARG1: Donald Trump] [V: fails] [ARG2: to condemn Roseanne Barr for racist comments at a rally in Nashville] but makes sure to take digs at Jay - Z.

[ARG0: Donald Trump] fails to condemn Roseanne Barr for racist comments at a rally in Nashville but [V: makes] [ARG1: sure to take digs at Jay - Z.]
[ARG0: Donald Trump] fails to condemn Roseanne Barr for racist comments at a rally in Nashville but makes sure to [V: take] [ARG1: digs] [ARG2: at Jay - Z.]
